inclusion.criterion: Patient seen in the paediatric nephrology service
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient agree to participate (if old enough to give his agreement) and written informed consent signed by parents
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients affiliated within the French universal healthcare system
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to 100 000 IU Uvedose treatment (according to the Summary of Product Characteristics: known hypersensitivity to vitamin D or hypercalcemia, hypercalciuria or nephrolithiasis)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has V. cholerae in stool specimen and is experiencing profuse watery diarrhea without odor.
